content.p: A county in the US is interested in using a risk assessment tool to assess a criminal defendant's likelihood to re-offend. The county's office of analytics has defined the analytic objectives for this project. Answer the following questions based on this scenario:

body.p: A constructive analytical objective for this scenario would be:

multiple_choice.choice: Demonstrate feasibility of the tool to assess the likelihood of recidivism using random forest models on a dataset that has offender data from 1960 until date.
Improve the performance of existing models developed by a neighboring county.

feedback.p: Correct: the stated objective is to develop a desired functionality from the available data and models without the need to fully optimize its performance yet.
Incorrect: Once feasibility of a task is established, then one can focus on a benchmarking tool as described in this answer.
